medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute abdominal pain, specifically in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) along with bowel cramping and nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient started feeling unwell with bowel cramping on the flight back. Today, she noticed a sharper pain in her RLQ that has progressed. Nausea present; she has not eaten since noon.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Tendonitis in her hip status post cortisone injection.
